name: Espilums
description:
Espilums was a present for my mother, a huge fan of Sega's Columns. 

The objective is to match the gems in combinations of three or more in any direction in order to score points and not entirelly filling the screen.

The shiny gems will destroy every gem of a certain type when in contact with them.

I hope you enjoy this game as much my mother did :)

Controls:

  • Move Right/Left with Right/Left arrow keys.
  • Drop instantly the current column with Down key.
  • Shuffle the jewels of the current column with SpaceBar key.
  • Pause with Esc key.
